Case Study

BC Web Studio

BC Web Studio needed a home for its own services that separated agency partnerships from business consulting while showcasing vetted case studies, service frameworks, and operating principles in one place.

Challenge

What they needed

BC Web Studio needed a home for its own services that separated agency partnerships from business consulting while showcasing vetted case studies, service frameworks, and operating principles in one place.

Approach

How we solved it

Designed and developed an Eleventy marketing site with JSON-driven case studies, Alpine.js filtering, and dedicated "For Agencies" and "For Businesses" landing pages. Built a Tailwind/PostCSS component system, reusable info cards, and media carousels powered by structured project data so updates stay fast and consistent.

Completed

December 2025

Stack highlights

  • Eleventy
  • Tailwind CSS
  • Alpine.js
  • Node.js
